create.description: Determines whether resources will be created (affects all resources)

tags.description: A map of tags to add to all resources

name.description: The name of the SNS topic to create

use_name_prefix.description: Determines whether `name` is used as a prefix

application_feedback.description: Map of IAM role ARNs and sample rate for success and failure feedback

content_based_deduplication.description: Boolean indicating whether or not to enable content-based deduplication for FIFO topics.

display_name.description: The display name for the SNS topic

fifo_topic.description: Boolean indicating whether or not to create a FIFO (first-in-first-out) topic

firehose_feedback.description: Map of IAM role ARNs and sample rate for success and failure feedback

http_feedback.description: Map of IAM role ARNs and sample rate for success and failure feedback

kms_master_key_id.description: The ID of an AWS-managed customer master key (CMK) for Amazon SNS or a custom CMK

lambda_feedback.description: Map of IAM role ARNs and sample rate for success and failure feedback

topic_policy.description: An externally created fully-formed AWS policy as JSON

sqs_feedback.description: Map of IAM role ARNs and sample rate for success and failure feedback

signature_version.description: If SignatureVersion should be 1 (SHA1) or 2 (SHA256). The signature version corresponds to the hashing algorithm used while creating the signature of the notifications, subscription confirmations, or unsubscribe confirmation messages sent by Amazon SNS.

tracing_config.description: Tracing mode of an Amazon SNS topic. Valid values: PassThrough, Active.

archive_policy.description: The message archive policy for FIFO topics.

create_topic_policy.description: Determines whether an SNS topic policy is created

source_topic_policy_documents.description: List of IAM policy documents that are merged together into the exported document. Statements must have unique `sid`s

override_topic_policy_documents.description: List of IAM policy documents that are merged together into the exported document. In merging, statements with non-blank `sid`s will override statements with the same `sid`

enable_default_topic_policy.description: Specifies whether to enable the default topic policy. Defaults to `true`

topic_policy_statements.description: A map of IAM policy [statements](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/aws/latest/docs/data-sources/iam_policy_document#statement) for custom permission usage

create_subscription.description: Determines whether an SNS subscription is created

subscriptions.description: A map of subscription definitions to create

data_protection_policy.description: A map of data protection policy statements
